name: Apple Cinnamon Instant Oatmeal 🥗
description: This Apple Cinnamon Instant Oatmeal is a delicious and easy breakfast option that is perfect for a busy morning. Creamy oatmeal is flavored with apples, cinnamon, and honey for a healthy and satisfying way to start your day.
instructions: Add the instant oatmeal, freeze-dried apples, pecans, cinnamon, vanilla bean, and sugar into a mason jar.
Store in a cool, dry place for up to a month.
To prepare, pour boiling water or milk over oats. Stir to combine and let sit for 3 minutes.
Serve with fresh chopped apples. Enjoy!
